name: Byron Cove Beach House

reviews.text: This B&B has a lovely set-up around a nice "tropical feel" courtyard with airy white-washed rooms and a refreshing plunge pool.
reviews.title: A very relaxing B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is not a five star hotel but provides simple and friendly comfort and is located in a quiet residential neighbourhood around 10 minutes walk from the main part of town and just a couple of hundred metres from the beach.
reviews.title: A wonderful oasis

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The nice touch of lighting the area with candles at night was noticed and added to the calming and relaxing ambiance of the place.
reviews.title: A lovely B&B
Beautiful stay
reviews.text: We were staying in Byron Bay just for one night on the way to visit family and happened to come acrss Byron Cove on a web search as a place to stay. We were so glad to find this real oasis. Whilst we were disappointed with Byron Bay itself the Byron Cove Beach House really made up for things. The owners are kind and welcoming and the place itself is beautifully appointed and we were made to feel most welcome. If we head this way again we will definitely check in again.

Unfortunately, we were only able to stay one night here. I say that, because this was a charming place to stay-perfectly summed up the laid back Byron Bay experience, but a little bit more 'grown up' than when I back-packed through here in 2001.
reviews.title: Byron Cove Beach House - is our new favourite getaway

description: Byron Cove is a beautiful, contemporary Australian style beach house only 2 minutes from the white sands of Belongil Beach and a short stroll to the centre of Byron Bay.
